## Meeting.default.publishTracks() method

Publishes specified local tracks in the meeting

**Signature:**

```typescript
publishTracks(tracks: {
        microphone?: MediaStreamTrack;
        camera?: MediaStreamTrack;
        screenShare: {
            audio?: MediaStreamTrack;
            video?: MediaStreamTrack;
        };
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tracks | { microphone?: MediaStreamTrack; camera?: MediaStreamTrack; screenShare: { audio?: MediaStreamTrack; video?: MediaStreamTrack; }; } |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
